rows.label: qst700202_msg0001
rows.name:
Mo? Does someone need
something from Dekudeku, mo?

rows.label: qst700202_msg0002
rows.name:
It is true that Dekudeku is currently
on the Voltis Trade Guild's traditional
'Walky-Walky' tour of Alst, mo.

rows.label: qst700202_msg0003
rows.name:
As you can see, Dekudeku is a prodigy
who will one day carry the future of the
Voltis Trade Guild on their back...

rows.label: qst700202_msg0005
rows.name:
Momo? You have a request for
Dekudeku, seeing my potential, mo?

rows.label: qst700202_msg0006
rows.name:
Momo... Revitalizing a failing
textile shop... Is that it, mo?

rows.label: qst700202_msg0008
rows.name:
It seems like a perfect
training exercise for my
tour of the guild, mo!

rows.label: qst700202_msg0009
rows.name:
That said, I can't just come up
with an idea that quickly, mo.

rows.label: qst700202_msg0010
rows.name:
Trying to make a huge profit
with a single idea... You're
all still too naive, mo!

rows.label: qst700202_msg0011
rows.name:
First, Dekudeku will go ahead
and speak with the textile
shop owner in detail, mo!

rows.label: qst700202_msg0012
rows.name:
Gathering information is the
foundation of business, mo!

rows.label: qst700202_msg0013
rows.name:
By the time you all get
back, I'll have a
revitalization plan ready, mo!

rows.label: qst700202_msg0101
rows.name:
First, we'll make two
styles of hats and decide
on a sales strategy, mo!

rows.label: qst700202_msg0102
rows.name:
I need you to give the materials
to the shop owner over there, mo!

rows.label: qst700202_msg0103
rows.name:
The revival of this shop
depends on all of you, mo!
